pages.text: $(li)Tasmanian Devils are small marsupials found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l).$(br)$(li)When attacking their preis $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/rabbit)Rabbits$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/chicken)Chickens$(/l), all nearby Tasmanian Devils will join in on the hunt.$(br)$(li)They will unleash a howl that turns their eyes red and can scare away all nearby monsters for a short time.
These little creatures cannot be tamed, but they can be bred with any meat.
